synopsis.text:
Nambaâ€™s two brothers, Mutta and Hibito, share a common dream sparked by a mysterious UFO sighting one fateful night: to become astronauts. Years down the line, Hibito is selected for a prestigious NASA mission, propelling the siblings to a critical juncture where their dreams and destinies intertwine.

In this captivating prequel to the renowned TV anime series, the focus shifts to the genesis of their aspirations. Titled "Uchuu Kyoudai #0 (Number Zero)," the film unveils the untold beginning of the manga that has come to symbolize Japan's dreams and emotions.

After 19 long years, Mutta's ambitions have stagnated, but an unexpected opportunity arises for him to follow in his brother's footsteps and fulfill their childhood promise. This is the origin story, the unwritten chapter 0, that sets the stage for their epic journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
